title: Font/Type design workshop ~ london?
content:
Hello,  
I would like to do a font/type design workshop or course in London.  
Do anyone know where can I do it?

Thanks,  
Nuno
author: nunosilva

comments.content:
Well, Reading has their MA in typeface design, and that's not far from London.

T

May be to late, but Central Saint Martins has their MA in Communication Design one of their Pathways is Graphic Design where the great Andrew Haslam teach Type and Language design

i.
